name: Demon Sorcerer and Guardian
author: KenjiHimura
guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Strong against grouped enemies;
- Strong crowd control;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 4 coins);
- Strongly mana’s dependent;
- Dependent on two tier 5 champions;
- Strongly dependent of magic damage;


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=dragon]]
[[trait=glacial]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=kassadin]]
[[champion=ahri]]
[[champion=braum]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=evelynn]]

[[champion=brand]]

[[champion=kassadin]]→[[champion=aatrox]]

[[champion=lulu]]→[[champion=morgana]]

[[champion=ahri]]→[[champion=aurelion-sol]]

[[champion=braum]]→[[champion=leona]]



#### Late Game:

[[champion=pantheon]]
[[champion=karthus]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]]

[[champion=brand]]→[[champion=swain]][[champion=varus]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]]→[[champion=brand]][[champion=aatrox]][[champion=evelynn]]

[[item=darkin]]→[[champion=pantheon]][[champion=leona]][[champion=aurelion-sol]][[champion=karthus]]
